parameters: You apply a heavy dose of the sunblock.
This door leads out of the building. The bright, peircing sun is no doubt pounding down onto the concrete. You know you would burn up if you stepped outside.
You apply a heavy dose of the sunblock.
This door leads out of the building. The bright, peircing sun is no doubt pounding down onto the concrete. You know you would burn up if you stepped outside.
A large clove of garlic sits on the table.
An empty plate, smelling faintly of garlic.
The final resting place of vegtables.
I haven't seen so much food in one place. I have to try everything!
I know the best recipe for a garlic roast chicken...
Perhaps this is the wrong time for that.
Some parts of the kitchen just can't be filled with jokes.
This is an empty countertop. What were you expecting?
So desperate for a joke that you're checking the countertop. Really?
There could've been a pun here.
This game is too serious for puns.
When two dishes fall in love, they \{sink\}.
I can't \{sink\} my fangs into this.
I'm not really much of a cook. I'm rather out of my \{\{element\}\} in the kitchen.
It's never about having an oven, and always about having food to cook.
Not designed for my type of food. Well, I suppose I could... That will have to wait, we have business to attend to.
The best part of a cutting board is the scraps that fall off the table.
I dislike knives... You could take someone's eye out!
Knives aren't nearly as efficient as fangs.
Don't make me tell the elephant in the butter joke.
I can't be held responsible for the jokes you'll find in the kitchen.
Chilled blood does not taste as good as you might expect.
Even I'm not deseperate enough to eat kale.
Kale, really? What were they thinking?
Bread is the most important food group.
Oh how I long to be able to enjoy bread again.
Chickens are bad at sports because they always get fowls.
I have to ham it to you on that excellent pun.
What a hamtastic cut of meat.
The only good part of ham is hamboning.
